SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ControllerTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ControllerTest
public class ControllerTest extends Object
Unit tests for the Controller class. These tests validate the behavior of the Controller class, which manages interactions between players, game actions, and communication with external systems via a Connection.

    • ControllerTest

      public ControllerTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test method. Initializes the mocks for Connection, Player, and Chat, and creates an instance of Controller with the mocked Connection.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during setup

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer()
      Tests the Controller.setPlayer(Player) method. Verifies that the player is correctly set.

    • getPlayer

      public void getPlayer()
      Tests the Controller.getPlayer() method. Verifies that the correct player is returned.

    • testActionChooseStarter

      public void testActionChooseStarter() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for choosing a starter card. Verifies that the Player.chooseStarterCardSide(boolean) method is called with the correct parameter.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionChooseStarterError

      public void testActionChooseStarterError() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for choosing a starter card with an error. Verifies that an appropriate error message is sent when a PlayerExceptions is thrown.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionChooseObjective

      public void testActionChooseObjective() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for choosing an objective card. Verifies that the Player.chooseObjective(int) method is called with the correct parameter.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionChooseObjectiveError

      public void testActionChooseObjectiveError() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for choosing an objective card with an error. Verifies that an appropriate error message is sent when a PlayerExceptions is thrown.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionPlayCard

      public void testActionPlayCard() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for playing a card. Verifies that the Player.playCard(int, Position, boolean) method is called with the correct parameters.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionPlayCardError

      public void testActionPlayCardError() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for playing a card with an error. Verifies that an appropriate error message is sent when a PlayerExceptions is thrown.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionDrawGold

      public void testActionDrawGold() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for drawing gold. Verifies that the Player.drawGold() method is called.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionDrawGoldError

      public void testActionDrawGoldError() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for drawing gold with an error. Verifies that an appropriate error message is sent when a PlayerExceptions is thrown.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionDrawResource

      public void testActionDrawResource() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for drawing a resource. Verifies that the Player.drawResource() method is called.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionDrawResourceError

      public void testActionDrawResourceError() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for drawing a resource with an error. Verifies that an appropriate error message is sent when a PlayerExceptions is thrown.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionDrawMarket

      public void testActionDrawMarket() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for drawing from the market. Verifies that the Player.drawMarket(int) method is called with the correct parameter.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionDrawMarketError

      public void testActionDrawMarketError() throws PlayerExceptions
      Tests the action handling for drawing from the market with an error. Verifies that an appropriate error message is sent when a PlayerExceptions is thrown.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - if an error occurs during the action

    • testActionInvalidMessage

      public void testActionInvalidMessage()
      Tests the action handling for an invalid message. Verifies that an InvalidMessage error message is sent.

    • testChatMessageWhenDisconnected

      public void testChatMessageWhenDisconnected() throws ChatException
      Tests handling of a chat message when the controller is disconnected. Verifies that no message is sent to the chat.
      Throws:
      ChatException - if an error occurs during chat message handling

    • testChatMessageWhenPlayerIsNull

      public void testChatMessageWhenPlayerIsNull() throws ChatException
      Tests handling of a chat message when the player is null. Verifies that a MatchDoesNotExistError is sent and no message is forwarded to the chat.
      Throws:
      ChatException - if an error occurs during chat message handling

    • testChatMessageWhenEverythingIsFine

      public void testChatMessageWhenEverythingIsFine() throws ChatException
      Tests handling of a chat message when everything is fine. Verifies that the message is sent to the chat with the correct sender name.
      Throws:
      ChatException - if an error occurs during chat message handling

    • testChatMessageWhenChatExceptionThrown

      public void testChatMessageWhenChatExceptionThrown() throws ChatException
      Tests handling of a chat message when a ChatException is thrown. Verifies that a ChatError is sent via the connection.
      Throws:
      ChatException - if an error occurs during chat message handling

    • testUpdateWhenDisconnected

      public void testUpdateWhenDisconnected()
      Tests handling of update messages when the controller is disconnected. Verifies that no message is forwarded to the connection.

    • testUpdateWhenConnected

      public void testUpdateWhenConnected()
      Tests handling of update messages when the controller is connected. Verifies that the message is forwarded to the connection exactly once.

    • getUsername

      public void getUsername()
      Tests the Controller.getUsername() method. Verifies that the correct username is retrieved from the connection.

    • setChat

      public void setChat()
      Tests the Controller.setChat(Chat) method. Verifies that the chat instance is correctly set.

    • getChat

      public void getChat()
      Tests the Controller.getChat() method. Verifies that the correct chat instance is retrieved.

    • removeChat

      public void removeChat()
      Tests the Controller.removeChat() method. Verifies that the chat instance is set to null after removal.

    • testSendChatMessageWhenDisconnected

      public void testSendChatMessageWhenDisconnected()
      Tests handling of sending a chat message when the controller is disconnected. Verifies that no message is forwarded to the connection.

    • testSendChatMessageWhenConnected

      public void testSendChatMessageWhenConnected()
      Tests handling of sending a chat message when the controller is connected. Verifies that the message is forwarded to the connection exactly once.

    • disconnected

      public void disconnected()
      Tests the Controller.disconnected() method. Verifies that the disconnected state is correctly set to true.

    • isDisconnected

      public void isDisconnected()
      Tests the Controller.isDisconnected() method. Verifies that the disconnected state is correctly retrieved.

    • setDisconnected

      public void setDisconnected()
      Tests the Controller.setDisconnected(boolean) method. Verifies that the disconnected state is correctly set.
